text.title: The DLCL Network
text.more: This graph shows connections among DLCL faculty based on all the relevant survey responses. Color indicates membership in a group of similar nodes. The size of a node indicates how many connections it has. You can zoom in to see labels, hover over a node, or search for a name in the search box. Clicking on a node will display only that node's immediate connections.
text.intro: This graph shows the DLCL's connections for research, teaching, structure, and collaboration.
